title: Login Issues
body: So I've been having this issue for about 1-2 weeks now where the game doesn't let me log in. After I enter my username and password and try to log in, it says that there is an unknown error and go to support on the League of Legends website, I've tried that but that doesn't work. After I log in the 2nd time, it just stays at Authenticating... and doesn't stop loading, I wait for about 10 hours and waited to see if I had succesfully logged on, but it was still at Authenticating... and never stopped, please someone help me. :(

replies.body:
I'm here to help!  This is very like a block in your connection that's struggling to get to the authentication server, so you're never able to login.  Grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and see if auto configuring firewall settings helps.

If not, run through each step of our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help rule out possibilities and snags.  Let me know if you have any questions!
